adverb.description: From or in connection with living matter.
Without the use of chemical fertilizers, pesticides, or other artificial chemicals.
examples: incentives offered to farmers to farm organically

adverb.description: In a way that relates to a bodily organ or organs.
examples: it's not a definable illness; there is nothing organically wrong

adverb.description: As elements of an organized whole.
examples: workers in both parts of the new economy are organically connected
little subplots which fit organically into the overall picture
